Eric Schmidt is also set to get a$ 100 million equity award, his first since joining the company in 2001, which will vest over four years and includes stock units and options. Google

into China,'' the BBC quoted Eric Schmidt , as saying. Although Eric Schmidt said that he was happy with Google's decision to stop co-operating with China over censorship in March last year, he added: Over time I would hope, especially in my new role with more of an external focus, that I can try to get more of Google, appropriately and within our policies, into China.
